citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00 am on 11-
MAR-24. Spoke to a facility representative who was leaving to watch their grandchild and was unable to stay for
inspection. No other representative was available. The facility representative later provided availability for the coming
months.
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:

inspection. No other representative was available. The facility representative later provided availability for the coming 
months.  
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and

End Section
